stmt.origin: ressnm(ccnfld, nat0, cz, cc, cabs, zring)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(nat0, cz), wss(cz, cc)), wceq(cres(cabs, cz), cfv(cnm, zring)))
-| wceq(zring, co(ccnfld, cress, cz))
-| wceq(cc, cfv(cbs, ccnfld))
-| wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, ccnfld))
-| wceq(cabs, cfv(cnm, ccnfld))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((CCfld ∈ Mnd ∧ 0 ∈ ℤ ∧ ℤ ⊆ ℂ)→(abs |` ℤ)=(norm ` ZZring))
⊣ ZZring =(CCfld[|`s]ℤ)
⊣ ℂ =(Base ` CCfld)
⊣ 0 =(0 ` CCfld)
⊣ abs =(norm ` CCfld)
